name: Postwind
body:
PostWind
========
PostWind is realeased under Creative Commons Attribution - No Commercial Use

Postwind is a cyberpunk roleplaying engine that will be used for the game PostWind, also developed by TimeChrome Studios.
This engine is coded in C++ by lacaulac, Sventar, Kino, LittlesMonsters and Ercry, five coders of TimeChrome Studio.
Happy hacking and playing!

Cette œuvre est mise à disposition sous licence Attribution - Pas d’Utilisation Commerciale 3.0 France. Pour voir une copie de cette licence, visitez http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/fr/ ou écrivez à Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
